original dialog info.head: PersonX thought about going to church
original dialog info.tail: to be interested in going to church
original dialog info.literal: Veda was interested in going to church. Veda thought about going to church.
original dialog info.narrative: Veda thought about going to church because she was interested in the religion. She had never been to church before, but she had heard good things about it. She decided to go to a nearby church and see what it was like.

log.user utterance: Hi, Father. I'm Veda. I'm new to the area and was curious about your church. Could you tell me a little bit about it?
log.system response: Of course, Veda. Our church is based on the teachings of Jesus Christ. We believe in loving our neighbor and treating others as we would want to be treated. We strive to live according to Christ's example and teachings.

log.user utterance: That sounds like a really great way to live. I can see why so many people are drawn to this religion. What do you think makes Christianity different from other religions?
log.system response: Well, there are a lot of different interpretations of Christianity, but for us, it's all about following Jesus Christ's example. He was a man who loved unconditionally and forgave easily. He preached compassion and understanding, even for those who disagreed with him or did not follow his teachings perfectly. We try to emulate that in our own lives."
log.dialog history: <USER> Hi, Father. I'm Veda. I'm new to the area and was curious about your church. Could you tell me a little bit about it? <SYSTEM> Of course, Veda. Our church is based on the teachings of Jesus Christ. We believe in loving our neighbor and treating others as we would want to be treated. We strive to live according to Christ's example and teachings.

log.user utterance: That does sound different. I know that forgiveness is a big part of Christianity, but it's not always easy to do. How do you think Christians are able to forgive so easily?
log.system response: Well, I think it comes from our belief that everyone is capable of change and redemption. We believe that no one is beyond hope or help, and so we are always willing to forgive those who have wronged us. It's not always easy, but it is something we strive for.
log.dialog history: <USER> Hi, Father. I'm Veda. I'm new to the area and was curious about your church. Could you tell me a little bit about it? <SYSTEM> Of course, Veda. Our church is based on the teachings of Jesus Christ. We believe in loving our neighbor and treating others as we would want to be treated. We strive to live according to Christ's example and teachings. <USER> That sounds like a really great way to live. I can see why so many people are drawn to this religion. What do you think makes Christianity different from other religions? <SYSTEM> Well, there are a lot of different interpretations of Christianity, but for us, it's all about following Jesus Christ's example. He was a man who loved unconditionally and forgave easily. He preached compassion and understanding, even for those who disagreed with him or did not follow his teachings perfectly. We try to emulate that in our own lives."

original dialog info.head: PersonX listens to PersonY's thoughts
original dialog info.literal: Rylea is a good friend. Rylea listens to Shavon's thoughts.
original dialog info.narrative: Rylea sat down with Shavon and asked him what was wrong. Shavon told Rylea that he was having a hard time and needed someone to talk to. Rylea said that he would be happy to be there for his friend.

log.user utterance: Hey Shavon, what's up? You seem troubled.
log.system response: Yeah, I am. I'm just having a hard time and needed someone to talk to.

log.user utterance: Of course, man. I'm always here for you. What's going on?
log.system response: It's just everything. Work is stressing me out, my relationship is falling apart, and I feel like I'm losing touch with my friends. I don't know what to do.
log.dialog history: <USER> Hey Shavon, what's up? You seem troubled. <SYSTEM> Yeah, I am. I'm just having a hard time and needed someone to talk to.

log.user utterance: Well, let's start with work then. What's going on there?
log.system response: It's just that everything is so demanding and I can't keep up. I'm constantly behind and it feels like I'm never going to catch up.
log.dialog history: <USER> Hey Shavon, what's up? You seem troubled. <SYSTEM> Yeah, I am. I'm just having a hard time and needed someone to talk to. <USER> Of course, man. I'm always here for you. What's going on? <SYSTEM> It's just everything. Work is stressing me out, my relationship is falling apart, and I feel like I'm losing touch with my friends. I don't know what to do.

log.user utterance: Okay, that does sound pretty tough. But it sounds like you're doing the best you can under the circumstances. Maybe you just need to cut yourself some slack and focus on one thing at a time. As for your relationship, what's going on there?
log.system response: We're just fighting all the time and it feels like we're growing apart instead of together. I don't know if we can make it through this rough patch.
log.dialog history: <USER> Hey Shavon, what's up? You seem troubled. <SYSTEM> Yeah, I am. I'm just having a hard time and needed someone to talk to. <USER> Of course, man. I'm always here for you. What's going on? <SYSTEM> It's just everything. Work is stressing me out, my relationship is falling apart, and I feel like I'm losing touch with my friends. I don't know what to do. <USER> Well, let's start with work then. What's going on there? <SYSTEM> It's just that everything is so demanding and I can't keep up. I'm constantly behind and it feels like I'm never going to catch up.

log.user utterance: Do you still love her?
log.system response: Yes, I do. But it's just so hard right now.

original dialog info.head: PersonX provides another service
original dialog info.literal: Jabriel provides another service because Jabriel wants to be a helpful person.
original dialog info.narrative: Jabriel provides a service by taking care of people's pets while they are out of town. Jabriel is a helpful person who loves animals, so she decided to start this business. She has been taking care of pets for three years and has never had any problems.

log.user utterance: Hi there! Are you looking for someone to take care of your pet while you're out of town?
log.system response: Yes, I am. I'm going on vacation for a week and I need someone to watch my cat.

log.user utterance: That's no problem at all! I love taking care of animals, and I have experience with cats. I'll be happy to take care of your cat while you're gone.
log.system response: That sounds great. How much do you charge?
log.dialog history: <USER> Hi there! Are you looking for someone to take care of your pet while you're out of town? <SYSTEM> Yes, I am. I'm going on vacation for a week and I need someone to watch my cat.

log.user utterance: I charge $20 per day, plus an additional $10 per day if you want me to stay overnight.
log.system response: That sounds reasonable. I'll definitely need you to stay overnight, so it will be $30 per day total. When can you start?
log.dialog history: <USER> Hi there! Are you looking for someone to take care of your pet while you're out of town? <SYSTEM> Yes, I am. I'm going on vacation for a week and I need someone to watch my cat. <USER> That's no problem at all! I love taking care of animals, and I have experience with cats. I'll be happy to take care of your cat while you're gone. <SYSTEM> That sounds great. How much do you charge?

log.user utterance: Any time that works for you! Just let me know when you'll be leaving and when you'll be back, and I'll take care of everything in between.
log.system response: Alright, I'll be leaving on Saturday and I'll be back next Saturday. Can you come over on Friday evening to meet my cat and get everything set up?
log.dialog history: <USER> Hi there! Are you looking for someone to take care of your pet while you're out of town? <SYSTEM> Yes, I am. I'll be happy to take care of your cat while you're gone. <SYSTEM> That sounds great. How much do you charge? <USER> I charge $20 per day, plus an additional $10 per day if you want me to stay overnight. <SYSTEM> That sounds reasonable. I'll definitely need you to stay overnight, so it will be $30 per day total. When can you start?

log.user utterance: Yes, that sounds perfect. I'll see you on Friday at 6pm.
log.dialog history: <USER> Hi there! Are you looking for someone to take care of your pet while you're out of town? <SYSTEM> Yes, I am. Can you come over on Friday evening to meet my cat and get everything set up?

original dialog info.head: PersonX always shares PersonY's point of view
original dialog info.literal: Danna is loyal. Danna always shares Mattea's point of view.
original dialog info.narrative: Danna always shares Mattea's point of view because he is loyal to his friend. Danna never questions Mattea's decisions and always stands by his side, no matter what the situation is.

log.user utterance: Hey, Mattea. What's up?
log.system response: Not much, what's up with you?

log.user utterance: Just hanging out, same old same old. So, what's new with you?
log.system response: Well, I've been thinking about what you said the other day.
log.dialog history: <USER> Hey, Mattea. What's up? <SYSTEM> Not much, what's up with you?

log.user utterance: What did I say?
log.system response: You know, about how I should stand up to my dad and stop letting him control my life.
log.dialog history: <USER> Hey, Mattea. What's up? <SYSTEM> Not much, what's up with you? <USER> Just hanging out, same old same old. So, what's new with you? <SYSTEM> Well, I've been thinking about what you said the other day.

log.user utterance: Oh yeah, that.
log.system response: Yeah, I've been thinking about it a lot and I've decided that you're right. I'm going to start standing up for myself more and not let him control me anymore.
log.dialog history: <USER> Hey, Mattea. What's up? <SYSTEM> Not much, what's up with you? <USER> Just hanging out, same old same old. So, what's new with you? <SYSTEM> Well, I've been thinking about what you said the other day. <USER> What did I say? <SYSTEM> You know, about how I should stand up to my dad and stop letting him control my life.

log.user utterance: That's great, Mattea! I'm really proud of you for making that decision.
log.system response: Thanks, Danna. It's not going to be easy, but I'm determined to do it.
log.dialog history: <USER> Hey, Mattea. What's up? <SYSTEM> Not much, what's up with you? <USER> Just hanging out, same old same old. So, what's new with you? <SYSTEM> Well, I've been thinking about what you said the other day. <USER> What did I say? <SYSTEM> You know, about how I should stand up to my dad and stop letting him control my life. <USER> Oh yeah, that. <SYSTEM> Yeah, I've been thinking about it a lot and I've decided that you're right. I'm going to start standing up for myself more and not let him control me anymore.

log.user utterance: You can do it, Mattea. I know you can.
log.dialog history: <USER> Hey, Mattea. What's up? <SYSTEM> Not much, what's up with you? <USER> Just hanging out, same old same old. So, what's new with you? <SYSTEM> Well, I've been thinking about what you said the other day. <USER> What did I say? <SYSTEM> You know, about how I should stand up to my dad and stop letting him control my life. <USER> Oh yeah, that. <SYSTEM> Yeah, I've been thinking about it a lot and I've decided that you're right. I'm going to start standing up for myself more and not let him control me anymore. <USER> That's great, Mattea! I'm really proud of you for making that decision. <SYSTEM> Thanks, Danna. It's not going to be easy, but I'm determined to do it.

original dialog info.head: PersonX reads PersonY's mind
original dialog info.literal: Cornell is intuitive. Cornell reads Dontrell's mind.
original dialog info.narrative: Cornell knows what Dontrell is thinking. He can sense her feelings and know exactly what she is going to say or do next.

log.user utterance: I know what you're thinking, Dontrell. I can sense your feelings and know exactly what you're going to say or do next. You're thinking about how much you miss your family, and how you wish you could see them again. You're wondering if there's anything you can do to make that happen. And you're also feeling a little guilty, because you know that if you could see them again, it would only be for a short while before they died.
log.system response: Cornell, how can you possibly know all that? It's like you can read my mind!

log.user utterance: I told you, I can sense your feelings. It's like I have a connection to your thoughts and emotions. I'm not sure why or how it works, but ever since we met, I've been able to understand what you're thinking and feeling pretty easily.
log.system response: Wow...that's amazing! And a little bit scary too. But it does explain why we've always been so close - even though we've only known each other for a few months.
log.dialog history: <USER> I know what you're thinking, Dontrell. I can sense your feelings and know exactly what you're going to say or do next. You're thinking about how much you miss your family, and how you wish you could see them again. You're wondering if there's anything you can do to make that happen. And you're also feeling a little guilty, because you know that if you could see them again, it would only be for a short while before they died. <SYSTEM> Cornell, how can you possibly know all that? It's like you can read my mind!

log.user utterance: Yeah, I guess our connection is pretty strong. But don't worry, Dontrell - I'll never use it to manipulate or control you in any way. I promise."
log.system response: That's a relief! I was starting to feel a little bit like you could read my mind, and it was kind of creepy. But if you promise not to use your abilities to control me, then I'm okay with it.
